Layer.imageModified

Function/Meaning
Whether the image has been modified
Type
Property of the Layer class (read/write)
Description
Indicates whether the layer's image has been modified. You can also set this value.
It is automatically set to true when drawing on the layer's image or changing the size of the layer's image.
By setting this property to false, it will become true when the layer's image is modified, allowing you to detect if the image has changed.
This property itself does not affect the behavior of the layer.
